page.title: 13MY HOTEL
page.content: I live in the Biarritz Hotel, St. Brelade's Bay. My dad is the manager and my mum is the manageress. It is fun for me because I meet and make lots of friends there. We have about 20 or more staff and I know them all. We have 3 meals a day. At dinner we have 6 courses except on Sunday when we have a buffet supper. We now have an{A-la-carte}menu which you order at lunch. You can also have a Biarritz Brunch instead of the evening meal. In the summer holidays I get up early in the morning for breakfast and then go to the keep fit session with the guests. In the afternoon I go down to the beach and sunbathe. Then I come back up and have a bath and get ready for dinner. After dinner I play with my friends or go to help run the evening activities which are organised for the guests.
